cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Energy and Commerce on July 13, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4275, Ensuring Phone and Internet Access Through Lifeline and Affordable Connectivity Program Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 114 (Wednesday, June 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. LURIA:
H.R. 4275.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
``U.S. Constitution, Article 8, Necessary and Proper Clause
[Page H3581]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: Ensuring Phone and Internet Access Through Lifeline and Affordable Connectivity Program Act of 2022
